bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, internal front derailleur cable routing, magnesium EVO Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 120mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Elite TLR Disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub, 28 hole, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Shimano Deore XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
